allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: upgrade to Expo SDK 54 and React Native 0.81

- Upgrade Expo SDK from 53 to 54.0.13
- Upgrade React Native from 0.79 to 0.81.4
- Upgrade React from 19.0 to 19.1.0
- Update all Expo packages to SDK 54 compatible versions
- Migrate from deprecated expo-av to expo-audio
- Update lucide-react-native to 0.546.0 for React 19 compatibility
- Fix Expo Router 6 navigation layout patterns
- Add comprehensive project documentation
EOF
)")
